title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.5 - Duty of licensee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.5 - Duty of licensee

State Regulations
A licensee conducting quarter horse racing with
pari-mutuel wagering, their officers, directors, officials, and employees, shall be responsible for the conduct of such racing meetings and each shall
observe and enforce this Subchapter, the orders and directions of the
commission, the Pari- Mutuel Revenue Law and the Quarter Horse Racing

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4204.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
